description: This is an acoustical metronome that plays a regular drumbeat. You can use it to time things, or to help you keep the beat while practicing music. You can pick any rate between 40 and 199 beats per minute. It will play the beats for up to 90 seconds. If you want more, you can ask it to repeat, or switch to a new rate. When you are done, you can say "Alexa stop" to terminate it.
name: Acoustic Metronome
shortDescription: Having trouble keeping the beat? TsaTsaTzu can help you keep your groove with a nice acoustical drum beat to help you keep time.
